original_title: Такое настроение, адажио Баха и небольшой фрагмент из жизни девушки Лены
overview: One day in the life of the girl Lena, looking for reasons (not) to get acquainted with men, (not) to have a family and children, (not) to love.
title: A Mood Like That, Bach’s Adagio and Several Episodes from the Life of the girl Lena
